divs: sighting details9\11\97or98 between 7268 pm observed a extremly bright light coming from the s.e. in a slow wide turnas if skirting the metro area. at about an angle of 75 degrees in relationshipto us the lights were shut off it continued its turn to the west. the shape wasa triangle with two lights on the front and one on each corner no flashinglights or markings, very low level buzzing sound could almost feel it. it didhave panels and i got the impression they were 60 feet by 20 feet i alsoremenber what seemed like high cloud cover. denver int. airport is about 40miles from here as the crow flies a even though the jets go or at five miles ican always here them. some how i have the impression that this was terrestialand had sound eliminating decieve operating on it as seen on discovery channelabout a year previously
